title: Sudden rule change shortens the time immigrants have to appeal their cases to 10 days
tags: Sudden rule change shortens the time immigrants have to appeal their cases to 10 daysThe Executive Office for Immigration Review published a rule on Friday that would also allow the Board of Immigration Appeals to quickly dismiss most cases.
